_N$string: 第一次便携设备到便携设备的交易在NOKIA900上实现

_components._N$string:
I started up on 2010
with 100$.
Now, I have

Dear players:
We are a part-time development team from well-known game companies in China. We want to create more blockchain games in the future, including simulation, SLG, and sandbox.
We love games and look at the blockchain. However, with entrepreneurial difficulties, we need everyone’s support to develop more innovative and fun games!
This is our first mini-game. I believe you must feel deeply about playing here. Long-term holding of value assets can really make you rich. NAS is such a value coin!
Your reward will help us reach more players and investors. Scan the QR code at the bottom to join our player community!

Feedback Description: The time machine will reward players with two rewards.

1. As long as the final asset reaches 1000 BTC, 0.01NAS upload bonus can be obtained from the reward pool when uploading data. Each address can only be awarded once. This reward is suspended when the reward pool is insufficient.
The award is automatically triggered by a smart contract. If Gas is not enough, you can welcome the public number to receive the start-up capital. The time machine only records your highest score without worrying about being overwritten.

2. As long as our game wins a weekly championship or higher, we will give back 10% of each winning prize.
We will assign this part of the reward according to the weight of each address (asset score × reward amount). Only the addresses with the top 100 weights can participate in the allocation.
The award will be issued by our smart contract at noon of the 7th day after the results of each award.
Donation will not override your highest score.

_N$placeholder: Note down your words on NAS blockchain...

_components._N$string: 我终于明白了什么叫长线投资。这样的好游戏，给我来一打！
